snippet: A Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman urged Vietnam and the Philippines to improve their relations with China by softening their stances in territorial disputes in the South China Sea.
abstract: Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman urges Vietnam and the Philippines to improve their relations with China by softening their stances in territorial disputes in the South China Sea; China has sent four marine surveillance ships to conduct exercises in the sea.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman urged Vietnam and the Philippines to improve their relations with China by softening their stances in territorial disputes in the South China Sea.

headline.main: China: 2 Neighbors Cautioned Over a Sea Dispute
headline.print_headline: China: 2 Neighbors Cautioned Over a Sea Dispute
